locations.name: Kingston
locations.title: Hurricane Melissa Response
locations.description: Deployed to Jamaica for 2 weeks for the humanitarian response and recovery after Hurricane Melissa. Worked closely with OCHA, UNDAC, IOM, WFP, MLSS government ministry, and others on the ground to support the emergency IM efforts.

locations.description: In-person workshop bringing together multiple agency partners for data collection training.

locations.name: Ankara

locations.description: In-person workshop supporting refugee assistance programs.

locations.name: Bogotá
locations.title: GTLo KoboToolbox & AI Training
locations.description: KoboToolbox and Introduction to AI for Humanitarians training for the Grupo de Trabajo de Localización en Colombia (GTLo). Delivered in Spanish.

locations.name: Buenos Aires
locations.title: UNHCR Training
locations.description: Multiple training sessions with UNHCR Buenos Aires, both in-person and online.

locations.name: Dar es Salaam
locations.title: FAO/SADC Workshop
locations.description: 5-day in-person workshop with FAO, Tanzania NPPO, and SADC partners.

locations.name: Dili
locations.title: CVTL & UNTL Workshops
locations.description: Multiple workshops in Timor-Leste including KoboToolbox and Introduction to AI for Humanitarians with Cruz Vermelha de Timor-Leste (CVTL) and a training workshop with UNTL. Delivered in English and Tetum.

locations.name: Jijiga
locations.title: Truth & Reconciliation Commission
locations.description: In-person training with the Ethiopia Somali Regional Truth and Reconciliation Commission.

locations.name: Kabul
locations.title: Gates Foundation & GPEI Workshop
locations.description: In-person workshop at IFRC/ARCS offices supporting polio eradication efforts.

locations.name: Lima
locations.title: R4V/GTRM Workshop
locations.description: In-person workshop supporting the Venezuela refugee response coordination. Delivered in Spanish.

locations.name: Santo Domingo

locations.name: Warsaw
locations.title: IFRC & UNHCR Trainings
locations.description: 2-day in-person training with IFRC including translation to Russian, and separate UNHCR training supporting the Ukraine response.
